content: this simple crochet pillow pattern is an easy to follow carefully designed pattern that works up quickly and will instantly enhance your home decor the pillow is made of only two stitches single_crochet and double_crochet yet it creates a beautiful textured modern pillow that looks fantastic when complete about the pattern - this simple crochet pillow pattern is perfect for beginners learning how to crochet a pillow or intermediate/advanced crocheters who would like an easy project - the pattern includes step by step instructions on how to make this pillow with pictures as well as a full video tutorial - it creates a beautiful textured modern diy pillow
